reviews.title: stear clear of this hotel
reviews.text: the place is a dump. The rooms are dirty and stink. The staff refuses to do anything if you complain. There are thiefs in the area and we know of at least two guests who had stuff stolen. We even had a someone try to break in the room while we were sleeping. If you do stay here, an I recommend very strongly that you don't, don't have the hotel arrange for transportation as they won't show up and won't refund your money
How many more things could have gone wrong:
reviews.title: One of the worst hotels I've ever stayed in

reviews.text: - passports "secured" in hotel safe were given away by the front desk to strangers!
reviews.title: good stay, bit overpriced

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we stayed here to be fair on new years day and the following night. We hadnt booked any accommodation and raleigh was heaving.
reviews.title: what a dump ....

likes.disliked: — the rooms were dirty and totally over priced!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: this hotel was charging 3,100 bahts a night - and frankly was a dump.
reviews.title: Loved the rats

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The best thing going for it was the fact it is up on the hill so great views of the sun rise coast line and mangroves.
reviews.title: Used to be heavenly - now definately hellish!

likes.disliked: — the staff, cleanliness and lack of sunbeds!

reviews.text: But the rooms were filthy, ant infested .. the beds were clean and clean linen - TB didnt work, didnt replace towels after room had been cleaned and had to ask five times for towells to be replaced. For the price it was a complete rip off - and would absolutely not recommend.
reviews.title: [--] Overpriced and Dirty

reviews.text: To try and find some positives, the garden and pool area are Ok.
reviews.title: Don't be misled by past reviews

likes.disliked: — The steps up to the hotel.
